basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HIV-1 viral protein R (Vpr))
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.17490682]HIV-1:inhibit the activity of  RNA-dependent DNA polymerase(IC50=0.7 µM);inhibit the activity of DNA-dependent DNA polymerase(IC50=1.3 µM);inhibit the activity of Rnase H(IC50=5.25 µM);Inhibition of 3′-end processing catalyzed by integrase(IC50=1.3 µM);inhibition of strand transfer catalyzed by integrase(IC50=1 µM);inhibition of disintegration catalyzed by integrase(IC50=10 µM).
